subject: Baseball
Civil Rights
Documentary Films and Programs
lead_paragraph: During the filming of “Chasing a Dream,” Hank Aaron’s principal concern was insuring that our focus would be more on civil rights and social history than on home runs and pennant chases.
snippet: During the filming of “Chasing a Dream,” Hank Aaron’s principal concern was insuring that our focus would be more on civil rights and social history than on home runs and pennant chases.
